sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
id,ref_num,parent,persid,active_flag,type,status,category,resolution_code,open_date,close_date,resolve_date,last_mod_dt,tenant,orig_user_organization,
group_id,assignee,log_agent,customer,priority,impact,urgency,replace(replace(replace(major_incident,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as major_incident,sla_violation,
predicted_sla_viol,macro_predict_viol,replace(replace(replace(problem,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as problem,time_spent_sum,zcontrato,zservicio,ztdavencido,ztdsvencido,ztda_id,
ztds_id,zreporting_met,zreportetipo,zencuesta,zempresabenef,zempresaparam,created_via,rootcause,affected_rc
,orig_user_admin_org
,zorgadmbenef
,zorgfunbenef
,year(dateadd(MI, -180, dateadd(SS, convert(int,open_date), '19700101'))) as year_open_date
,month(dateadd(MI, -180, dateadd(SS, convert(int,open_date), '19700101'))) as month_open_date
from call_req
WHERE 
last_mod_dt > @{pipeline().parameters.targetDaily}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select contact_uuid,replace(replace(replace(last_name,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as last_name, 
replace(replace(replace(first_name,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as first_name,
replace(replace(replace(middle_name,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as middle_name,
replace(replace(replace(alias,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as alias,
replace(replace(replace(email_address,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as email_address,
inactive, contact_type, organization_uuid, company_uuid, department,admin_organization_uuid,tenant
from ca_contact

select id, 
replace(replace(replace([sym],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as [sym], 
replace(replace(replace([description],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as [description], persid
from prob_ctg

select id, name, description
from ca_contact_type

SELECT [id]
      ,[tenant]
      ,[VigenciaInicio]
      ,[VigenciaTermino]
      ,[del]
      ,replace(replace(replace([description],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as description
      ,replace(replace(replace([sym],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as sym
      ,[EmpresaContratada]
      ,[EmpresaContratante]
      ,[VigenciaIndef]
      ,[OrgResponsable]
      ,[ContratoInterno]
  FROM [zContrato]

SELECT [id]
      ,[tenant]
      ,[contrato]
      ,[VigenciaInicio]
      ,[VigenciaTermino]
      ,[del]
      ,replace(replace(replace([description],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as description
      ,replace(replace(replace([sym],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as sym
      ,[VigenciaIndef]
  FROM [zServicio]

select DISTINCT own.own_resource_uuid,own.own_resource_id,
replace(replace(replace(own.resource_name,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as resource_name
from ca_owned_resource own
WHERE ExISTS(SELECT 1 FROM call_req sub
WHERE sub.affected_rc=own.own_resource_uuid)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
id,ref_num,parent,persid,active_flag,type,status,category,resolution_code,open_date,close_date,resolve_date,last_mod_dt,tenant,orig_user_organization,
group_id,assignee,log_agent,customer,priority,impact,urgency,replace(replace(replace(major_incident,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as major_incident,sla_violation,
predicted_sla_viol,macro_predict_viol,replace(replace(replace(problem,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as problem,time_spent_sum,zcontrato,zservicio,ztdavencido,ztdsvencido,ztda_id,
ztds_id,zreporting_met,zreportetipo,zencuesta,zempresabenef,zempresaparam,created_via,rootcause,affected_rc,orig_user_admin_org
from call_req
WHERE 
last_mod_dt > @{pipeline().parameters.targetDaily}

SELECT 

  logg.id as ticket_log_id_ref,
  tick.ref_num as ticket_number,
  tick.open_date as ticket_open_date,
  logg.time_stamp as ticket_log_time_stamp,
  logg.system_time as ticket_log_system_time,
  logg.last_mod_dt as ticket_log_last_modified,
  logg.analyst     as ticket_log_analyst,
  logg.type        as ticket_log_type,
  logg.internal    as ticket_log_internal,
  logg.time_spent  as ticket_log_time_spent

  FROM act_log logg
  INNER JOIN call_req tick ON (logg.call_req_id = tick.persid)

WHERE 
tick.last_mod_dt > @{pipeline().parameters.targetDaily}

SELECT 
    sur.id,
    sur.object_type,
    sur.[object_id],
    sur.last_mod_dt as last_mod_dt_survey,
    sur.last_mod_by as last_mod_by_survey,
    suq.id as question_id, 
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(suq.txt,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as question,
    suq.sequence as question_order,
    suq.[response] survey_response_value,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(nvarchar(max),suq.qcomment),char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as qcomment,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sua.txt,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as survey_response, 
    sua.[sequence] as sequence_answer,
    sua.last_mod_dt as last_mod_dt_answer,
    sua.last_mod_by as last_mod_by_answer,
    sur.tenant, 
    suq.mult_resp_flag,
    suq.resp_required,
    suq.include_qcomment

FROM survey sur

    LEFT OUTER JOIN survey_question suq ON (sur.id=suq.owning_survey)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN survey_answer   sua ON (suq.id=sua.own_srvy_question AND sua.selected=1)

WHERE sur.last_mod_dt > @{pipeline().parameters.targetDaily}
